name: Retroplane
description:
Description

Retroplane is a retro flying game, with the goal being getting the highest score possible.

Controls

-Mouse for movement

-Middle Mouse to Lock onto a target

-W/S for throttle

-A/D for roll

-K to disable UI

-L to take Screenshot

-Shift to Boost

-C to freelook

Contact Info

If you have this link you probably know the developers so go ahead
